name: Smart Menu
description: Smart digital menu system for restaurants

scripts.postdeploy: bundle exec rake db:migrate && bundle exec rake assets:precompile

RAILS_ENV.description: The Rails environment for the app

RAILS_SERVE_STATIC_FILES.description: Enable serving static files from Rails

NODE_MODULES_CACHE.description: Disable Yarn cache to prevent issues

SMART_MENU_VOICE_ENABLED.description: Enable public voice command endpoints and processing

SMART_MENU_VOICE_WHISPER_ENABLED.description: Enable OpenAI Whisper audio transcription (requires OPENAI_API_KEY)

SMART_MENU_VECTOR_SEARCH_ENABLED.description: Enable semantic menu item matching (requires pgvector + SMART_MENU_ML_URL)

SMART_MENU_ML_RERANK_ENABLED.description: Enable ML reranking step for semantic match (requires SMART_MENU_ML_URL)
